get.description: Query reviews based on search criteria. When making subsequent requests that include continuation tokens, be sure to pass the same search criteria. Otherwise the subsequent requests may return unexpected results.

parameters.name: ifModifiedSince
parameters.description: Fetch latest review data if it was modified after IfModifiedSince timestamp.

post.description: Fetch file contents based on criteria. Criteria can be a set of iteration ids or content hashes. POST /_apis/codereview/reviews/{id}/contentsBatch

patch.description: Create or update review properties collection. PATCH /_apis/codereview/reviews/{reviewId}/iterations/{iterationId}/properties The patch operation can be add, replace or remove. For add operation, the path can be empty. If the path is empty, the value must be a list of key value pairs. For replace operation, the path cannot be empty. If the path does not exist, the property will be added to the collection. For remove operation, the path cannot be empty. If the path does not exist, no action will be performed.

get.description: Get all the statuses associated with an iteration. GET /_apis/codereview/reviews/{reviewId}/iterations/{iterationId}/statuses
Get the specific iteration status. GET /_apis/codereview/reviews/{reviewId}/iterations/{iterationId}/statuses/{statusId}

patch.description: Create or update review properties collection. PATCH /_apis/codereview/reviews/{reviewId}/properties The patch operation can be add, replace or remove. For add operation, the path can be empty. If the path is empty, the value must be a list of key value pairs. For replace operation, the path cannot be empty. If the path does not exist, the property will be added to the collection. For remove operation, the path cannot be empty. If the path does not exist, no action will be performed.

get.description: Get all the statuses associated with a review. GET /_apis/codereview/reviews/{reviewId}/statuses
Get the specific review status. GET /_apis/codereview/reviews/{reviewId}/statuses/{statusId}

post.description: Create a review comment thread. POST /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/Threads

get.description: Get all review comment threads of a review. GET /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/Threads/ When modifiedSince parameter is passed, fetch threads of a review that were modified after modifiedSince timestamp.
Get a review comment thread by id for a review. Return 304 if comment thread hasn't modified based on ifModifiedSince header. GET /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/Threads/{threadId}

parameters.name: ifModifiedSince
parameters.description: Fetch latest comment data if it was modified after IfModifiedSince timestamp.

get.description: Read all comments for a review comment thread by id for a review. GET /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/Threads/{threadId}/comments

delete.description: Soft delete a comment. Deleted(Withdrawn) comments are always returned. Use IsDeleted flag in each comment to detect if its a deleted comment, Delete /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/Threads/{threadId}/comments/{commentId}

get.description: Get a comment for a review comment thread by id of a review based on commentId. GET /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/Threads/{threadId}/comments/{commentId}

post.description: Like a comment in a thread for a review. POST /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/threads/{id}/comments/{commentId}/likes

get.description: Get all likes of a comment in a thread for a review. GET /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/threads/{id}/comments/{commentId}/likes

delete.description: Withdraw like of a comment in a thread for a review. DELETE /_apis/CodeReview/reviews/{id}/threads/{id}/comments/{commentId}/likes/{userId}

contentHash.description: Content hash of on-disk representation of file content. Its calculated by the client by using SHA1 hash function.

description.description: The description of the attachment, can be null.

displayName.description: The display name of the attachment, can't be null or empty.

changeAction.description: Indicates if current notification is due to adding, or deleting attachment(s).

changeId.description: Uniquely tracks each change in an iteration. Automatically generated in server.

extendedChangeType.description: Change types as provided by source control. It contains change types that aren't supported by Type field.

type.description: Specify simplified change types that can be used by client to drive client logic.

latestReviewUpdatedTimestamp.description: Last updated timestamp of the review after occurance of the event.

priorReviewUpdatedTimestamp.description: Last updated timestamp of the review prior to occurance of the event.

reviewId.description: Code review Id associated with the notification.

sourceArtifactId.description: Artifact id that can relate a code review with an external review. Example: Pull request Id.

threadContext.description: Specify thread context such as position in left/right file.

changeTrackingId.description: Used to track a comment across iterations.

filePath.description: File path relative to the root of the repository. It's up to the client to use any path format.

iterationContext.description: Specify comparing iteration Ids when a comment thread is added while comparing 2 iterations.

leftFileEnd.description: Position of last character of the comment in left file.

leftFileStart.description: Position of first character of the comment in left file.

rightFileEnd.description: Position of last character of the comment in right file.

rightFileStart.description: Position of first character of the comment in right file.

trackingCriteria.description: The criteria used to track this thread. If this property is filled out when the thread is returned, then the thread has been tracked from its original location using the given criteria.

firstComparingIteration.description: The first comparing iteration being viewed. Threads will be tracked if this is greater than 0.

secondComparingIteration.description: The second comparing iteration being viewed. Threads will be tracked if this is greater than 0.

contentHashes.description: If provided, specifies the exact content hashes of the files to fetch. Cannot be combined with other parameters such as IterationIds.

fileType.description: If provided, specifies the file type to fetch. Applicable only for content hashes.

filterBy.description: If provided, filter iteration files by fetching only base files or modified files. Applicable only for iterations.

iterationIds.description: If provided, specifies the iteration ids of the files to fetch. Cannot be combined with Content hashes.

voteDescription.description: Text representation of vote. This can be null if user hasn't voted yet.

firstComparingIteration.description: First comparing iteration Id. Minimum value is 1.

secondComparingIteration.description: Second comparing iteration Id. Minimum value is 1.

receivers.description: Identities of users who will receive a share notification.

subject.description: Append text to subject of share notification. Ex: Email subject. When missing, server will set to a default.

resourceType.description: The type of the resource that properties are associated with.

iterationId.description: Id of a valid published iteration. Latest iteration where the reviewer had voted. When a reviewer votes, client provided iterationId must be a published iterationId. When null, latest published iterationId is used.

kind.description: Specifies reviewer kind. Its set to "optional" if not set for a new reviewer.

reviewerStateId.description: Specifies reviewer vote. By default, its set to "No response" if not set for a new reviewer. If a reviewer has voted on multiple iterations then it provides vote of latest iteration.

votedForGroups.description: Specifies the groups (if any) for which this reviewer has voted. It will have length > 0 only if the reviewer is a member of other groups and have voted. Voted means having reviewer state other than the initial "NotStarted" state.

changeAction.description: Indicates if current notification is due to adding, updating or deleting reviewer(s).

reviewers.description: Reviewers that got added/updated or deleted.

flags.description: A generic way to store metadata about a particular change entry content. This information is later used by the IReviewContentProvider to decide how to retrieve the content.

sHA1Hash.description: Content hash of on-disk representation of file content. Its calculated by the client by using SHA1 hash function. Ensure that uploaded file has same encoding as in source control.

review.description: The code review payload from the client

globalSettings.description: The settings shared between all the source control connections.

settings.description: The settings that are not shared by all the source control connections.

description.description: The description of the status, can be null.

targetUrl.description: The url associated with the status, can be null.

genre.description: The genre of the status, can be null.

name.description: The name of the status, can't be null or empty.

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
